tasks.task: Attend an event promoting pulses as part of global food security.
subtasks: Learn about the nutritional benefits of pulses.
Taste pulses and consider incorporating them into regular meals.

tasks.task: Understand the use of mutation breeding in pulse crop development.
subtasks: Recognize mutation breeding's role in creating adaptable and high-yield pulse varieties.

tasks.task: Recognize the benefits of pulses in soil fertility.
subtasks: Understand how pulses fix atmospheric nitrogen and improve soil fertility.
Recognize the role of nuclear techniques in determining pulse varieties' nitrogen fixation.
